text:
[Verse]
Walking down the street
Moonlight at my feet
City hums so sweet
Lost in the night heat

[Verse 2]
Stars are shining bright
In the pale moonlight
Whispers take their flight
Feels like it's just right

[Chorus]
Under the stars we dream
Let the world just stream
Life is more than it seems
Under the stars we gleam

[Verse 3]
Silence all around
Heartbeats the only sound
Freedom we have found
In this moment unbound

[Bridge]
Hold me just a while
Inside your gentle smile
Let's forget the miles
And the busy endless trials

[Chorus]
Under the stars we dream
Let the world just stream
Life is more than it seems
Under the stars we gleam
title: Under the Stars
